data.actual_result: The HTML entity is half cut off making it render bad near the spot where the text truncates.
data.expected_result: If a character represented by an HTML entity doesn't fit in description, it should be removed completely
data.short_description: [Backend issue affecting all clients] Website embeds may cut off the description text in the middle of an HTML entity
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a website with a long description, with an HTML entity near the character limit that the embed can show (very uncommon case so try with the link in attachment) - Post the link of this website in Discord
